name: libsquish-js
description: A functional Emscripten port of libsquish.
author: Koerismo

scripts.install-emsdk-linux: cd ./emsdk && ./emsdk install latest && ./emsdk activate latest && cd ../
scripts.install-emsdk-windows: cd ./emsdk && ./emsdk.bat install latest && ./emsdk.bat activate latest && cd ../
